name: Jaganathan T
description: T. Jaganathan is a University First (Gold Medalist) Engineer with Business Administration Diploma. Has held key corporate positions for 18 years. Specifically, he built up the Total India Networking Infrastructure for ANZ Grindlays Bank (currently Standard Chartered Bank). He was part of the Senior Management Team that set up world Class 350-seater BPO Center in Mumbai for EFunds International. He had handled technology migration for key outsourcing projects like West Teleservices, AMEX, etc.

name: Santhiya G
description: Santhiya.G (Senior Developer) has experience of 3+ years in IT industry. Created innovative software products in the areas of Service Management and Sales Management. ispark crm is the Service Management Software is a web-based enterprise solutions covering modules namely ticket Management, department Management and other service management related modules.

name: Veera
